If you don’t already have a plan in the event of a wildfire evacuation order, then do it now. Pack a bag, gather medicine and important documents, think about your pets and old photos you can’t replace.

Get prepared—now. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ef-muBLXYAY6M3L.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1296933046004965376/vid/320x320/OSltRXYZUJnCxfzK.mp4?tag=13

The wildfires have severely impacted air quality in California and across the West Coast. We can’t overlook how serious this is during an ongoing public health crisis. Take steps to protect yourself—and check in on loved ones and neighbors. https://www.fresnobee.com/news/california/fires/article245574900.html

JOIN US for next week’s Sojourner Truth Women’s Vote Project #TruthTuesdays event on Sept. 15, when we will welcome @staceyabrams, @DebbieforFL, and @LaurenUnderwood for a robust conversation on Our Democracy in a Pandemic. 

RSVP here:  https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_fYnVbvvASeiRLSfBgATapQ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhvxuUoX0AUaGk1.jpg

California’s historic wildfires have burned a record-breaking level of destruction with months still left in the wildfire season. Climate change created these conditions—we must take urgent & bold action to address the climate crisis now. https://twitter.com/WSJ/status/1303502149293346816 QT @WSJ California’s wildfires this year have already burnt more acres than in any other year on record https://trib.al/5KBunpp

.@HoustonChron: Inside Sen. Cruz's big play to block Vladimir Putin's #NordStream2 pipeline https://www.houstonchronicle.com/business/energy/article/Ted-Cruz-Putin-pipeline-texas-politics-Russia-oil-15558550.php?utm_campaign=CMS%20Sharing%20Tools%20(Premium)&utm_source=t.co&utm_medium=referral

There is no better location for @US_SpaceCom than Texas. That’s why I sent a letter to @SecAFOfficial advocating for Fort Worth, Houston, and San Antonio to be selected to host the future USSPACECOM HQ. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1304758333094744064/img/RY9Gyz4USNHdsEJd.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1304758333094744064/vid/480x270/sJ2ebSPpupo1gFlv.mp4?tag=13

That’s why I introduced my SCRIPT Act, legislation that would force Hollywood studios to choose between the assistance they need from the American government and the dollars they want from China. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ehug186WkAEBGzp.jpg

This is just wrong. @Disney has completely abandoned American values and cashed out to the murderous thugs of the Chinese Communist Party.

U.S. companies need to stand up for freedom and stop kowtowing to China.

If Biden wins in November and appoints Bernie Sanders as Secretary of State, we’ll see open hostility toward our friend and ally Israel and an embrace of tyrannical socialist dictators like Venezuela’s Maduro.

RELEASE: Sen. Cruz Calls for Criminal Investigation Into @Netflix’s “Cuties.” Urges @TheJusticeDept to investigate if executives, filmmakers violated federal laws against production & distribution of child pornography.

RT @david_lippman .@SenTedCruz sent a letter to Attorney General William Barr asking for an investigation into whether the @netflix film #Cuties violates child pornography laws: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhrpMGJXYAAr6qW.jpg

Following @netflix’s disturbing promotion of “Cuties,” I sent a letter calling on @TheJusticeDept to investigate whether Netflix, its executives, or the filmmakers violated any federal laws against the production and distribution of child pornography. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhtqxJgWkAAYfkr.jpg

Millions of people are gasping in a smoldering haze right now in the middle of a pandemic. Farm workers & other workers of color who can't afford to stay home are particularly at risk. We must fight for #EnvironmentalJustice as we fight the #ClimateCrisis. https://www.npr.org/2020/09/07/909314223/farm-workers-face-double-threat-wildfire-smoke-and-covid-19

Political appointees trying to interfere in the COVID-19 response and suppress public health officials should be removed from their posts. Immediately. https://www.politico.com/news/2020/09/11/exclusive-trump-officials-interfered-with-cdc-reports-on-covid-19-412809
It’s been 79 days since the House passed the #JusticeInPolicing Act to protect Black lives and end police brutality. What are you waiting for, @SenateMajLdr McConnell?

The terrifying pictures from California, Oregon, and Washington make it clear: the #ClimateCrisis is an existential threat to our country and planet. No one state can stop this crisis on its own. The federal government must #ActOnClimate now. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/09/10/us/climate-change-california-wildfires.html

It’s a federal crime to lie to Congress. If @SmithfieldFoods’ CEO was aware of @OSHA_DOL’s findings at the same time he called allegations of worker mistreatment demonstrably false, he should be held accountable.

A few months ago, @SmithfieldFoods' CEO said our concerns about the company exploiting workers are “patently and demonstrably false” & whined about being treated unfairly in a full page @NYTimes ad. This meager, months-too-late fine isn’t enough. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-03/world-s-top-pork-producer-goes-on-defensive-over-virus-response

I've called for @OSHA_DOL to do its job & increase enforcement, but this is shameful. OSHA could have issued a citation for violations of social distancing guidelines in every section of the plant. They could have classified the violations as willful & charged higher penalties.

I'm glad @OSHA_DOL has now acknowledged that failing to keep workers safe from COVID-19 is a violation of the general duty clause. But they investigated this Smithfield facility in March – why did they wait until thousands of workers got sick, & some died, before taking action?

.@SmithfieldFoods exploited the COVID crisis & put thousands of lives at risk. @OSHA_DOL shrugged as workers died, then issued the lowest possible fine for endangering thousands of workers, sending a message that companies won't face real accountability. https://www.argusleader.com/story/news/crime/2020/09/10/osha-fines-smithfield-foods-sioux-falls-south-dakota/5768786002/

America is crying out for leadership—while Donald Trump continues to ignore science, fan the flames of racism, and employ tactics from the playbook of fascists and dictators. 

We have to meet this moment. Electing @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris is our moral obligation.

One way to fight back against this administration’s attempts to stir chaos, and suppress the vote? Become a poll worker in your community.

https://elizabethwarren.com/take-action/pollworker

I can’t help but feel a deep down fury when I think of how Donald Trump knew about the severity of the coronavirus and willingly downplayed its seriousness—endangering thousands of lives. 

We need real leadership. And that’s not Donald Trump. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhuYsOGXcAATw2u.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1304803108678242304/vid/320x320/0wqf__3MKrK0vSJi.mp4?tag=13

WATCH! 

Like or retweet this recap below on what Sen. Rubio has been working on this week! http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1304755109902123008/img/9cUdOt5npX4rFTCn.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1304755109902123008/vid/480x270/sr0FtPhmlnlzk9tn.mp4?tag=13

There are people in Washington who say the Green New Deal is too expensive and we can’t afford it.

What is the alternative? 

A planet which is burning up? http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhvxLk_X0AMgUYz.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1304900305805553666/vid/320x320/684GF9IgKgp7rxkU.mp4?tag=13

Unless we successfully combat climate change, the terrible wildfires we are seeing will only get worse in the future — as will droughts, floods and extreme weather disturbances. 

No excuses.

We need to transform our energy system away from fossil fuel NOW and save the planet.

Not only do we have to beat Trump. This is wealthiest country in the history of the world. Over the past few years, CA has experienced some of the largest, most destructive wildfires in history—fueled & intensified by the climate crisis.

While Trump denies the evidence of this crisis, @JoeBiden will get to work taking the drastic action we need on day 1 to combat it. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1304501050100023297 QT @washingtonpost Several million acres are burning in the West, leaving at least 17 dead.

Fire experts are struggling to come up with a historical analog for this event. https://trib.al/BmPlBMP
It didn’t have to be this bad. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhvYsLyWAAAi0Pb.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1304873536255860742/vid/320x320/ZWZ9LeLMztXeb3Pl.mp4?tag=13

To everyone in California, Oregon, Washington, and throughout the West affected by the devastating wildfires, know that @JoeBiden and I stand with you for however long it takes to recover and rebuild. Stay safe.
https://joebiden.com/2020/09/12/statement-by-vice-president-joe-biden-on-the-ongoing-wildfires/

RT @JoeBiden You deserve a President and Vice President who will spend every minute of every day working to make your life better.

I promise that’s exactly what @KamalaHarris and I will do.

What is this evil realm we are living in ?! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ehuby5KXsAEHvQm.jpg

.@TulsiGabbard is right. https://twitter.com/TulsiGabbard/status/1304587833584226305 QT @TulsiGabbard .@netflix child porn "Cuties" will certainly whet the appetite of pedophiles & help fuel the child sex trafficking trade. 1 in 4 victims of trafficking are children. It happened to my friend's 13 year old daughter. Netflix, you are now complicit. #CancelNetflix http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhrTXSNUwAE8O0m.jpg

RT @RobbersonJon I worked for Disney XD (2013-2014)

I did 5 shows for them. 

I also did “Power Rangers” in 2002

So “tween” TV used to be my job. 

Something is very VERY wrong here http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ehvca0TU8AAlWyj.jpg
Inside Cruz’s big play to block Vladimir Putin’s pipeline. https://www.houstonchronicle.com/business/energy/article/Ted-Cruz-Putin-pipeline-texas-politics-Russia-oil-15558550.php

Before I was in the Senate, I argued numerous cases going after pedophiles, and child pornography has real victims. It destroys lives. And it is a federal felony.

Why are supposedly “mainstream” journalists going out of their way to defend child porn? https://twitter.com/MarkHarrisNYC/status/1304814707652603905 QT @MarkHarrisNYC Ted Cruz doesn't give a damn about child porn (or porn, or children). He and other politicians who are jumping on this ugly lie are doing it for one reason: They need ways to wink to QAnon without being too explicit. https://twitter.com/SenTedCruz/status/1304754228477472768

Some professor seems to be under the mistaken impression that, if child pornography is produced overseas, U.S. companies can distribute it here in the United States without facing criminal liability.

Although perhaps a popular view in the faculty lounge, that is not federal law. https://twitter.com/dandrezner/status/1304805840973594627 QT @dandrezner Ted Cruz is apparently unaware that he’s upset about a foreign film. And I wonder how many other outraged folks are clueless about that simple fact. https://twitter.com/SenTedCruz/status/1304754228477472768

RT @nypost Ted Cruz joins bipartisan group of lawmakers condemning Netflix film 'Cuties' https://nypost.com/2020/09/12/cruz-joins-group-of-lawmakers-condemning-netflix-film-cuties/?utm_source=NYPTwitter&utm_campaign=SocialFlow&utm_medium=SocialFlow http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhuHP0dXkAAm_Wr.jpg
@KFILE That’s horrible. Heidi and I will be lifting up Francesca in prayer. May God’s healing hand be upon her.

If you don't want Donald Trump appointing even more far-right justices to the Supreme Court, then please join me in working as hard as we can to elect @JoeBiden.
https://www.cbsnews.com/news/trump-releases-list-new-supreme-court-nominees-second-term/

My friend @ReverendWarnock will be a powerful fighter for the people of Georgia and push this nation closer to our stated ideals of justice and equality. Help send him to the Senate: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/warnock-for-georgia_social?refcode=twbooker200910 https://twitter.com/ReverendWarnock/status/1303660020446433282 QT @ReverendWarnock When I was 12, I was falsely accused of shoplifting in a grocery store. My experience dealing with structural inequality as a black kid is the same as many, and in the Senate, I will fight to level the playing field for all working Georgians. Watch my new ad now: http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1303519696847859713/img/-pBfyLqTDTuuAKqq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1303519696847859713/vid/480x270/qiBDjnl1s2D5zoSb.mp4?tag=13

The orange skies of San Francisco are an urgent call to action. Climate change is an existential threat that demands our immediate attention. It's time we started acting like it. https://twitter.com/OmarJimenez/status/1304065750324391936 QT @OmarJimenez Someone put Bladerunner 2049 music to drone footage of San Francisco and at first I didn’t know whether to be amazed or horrified. This is very much horrifying. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1303909097616502785/pu/img/cCJFfQ4DkqY5LHSU.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1303909097616502785/pu/vid/480x270/Vj4g2EaCyWu82YT7.mp4?tag=10

Grateful to Bono for joining us today for the 19th annual G7 Speakers’ Meeting & driving home our responsibility to protect the most basic foundations of our democracies. #TogetherOnClimate #G7Parliament http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ehwmml0WoAEDXve.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1304951946365808641/vid/480x270/XkohPf5mcEO3H4de.mp4?tag=13

Secretary @JohnKerry’s address to our #G7Parliament meeting was a striking call-to-action. I hope you will take a moment to listen. #TogetherOnClimate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhwY9dUWkAUxP8y.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1304936125539254272/vid/480x270/mSJUSaOiuO-4-PIq.mp4?tag=13

Grateful to @GinaNRDC & @DrBobBullard for enlightening us on the issues of environmental, racial and economic injustice during today’s #G7Parliament meeting. Your insights are invaluable as we seek to secure an equitable future for all. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhwQOalWsAMpVdC.jpg
Read our joint declaration in full here: https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/91220-0

Following the end of today’s meeting, the G7 Speakers & Heads of Parliament released a joint declaration focusing on the need for strong international action to combat the disparities in health & financial security that have been highlighted by the climate crisis & #COVID19. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhwLHQCWkAIJPs_.jpg

As a global community, we must ensure that we not only end COVID-19, but that all communities equitably benefit from equitable recovery. Thank you to Secretary @Madeleine Albright, @rajshah and Dr. Jim Yong Kim for joining us for an engaging conversation! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhvMWcVXcAcSe6b.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhvMWcZXcAAbRg2.jpg

Such a privilege to have Secretary @JohnKerry address our #G7Parliament meeting today. Thank you for bringing the urgency to address the climate crisis into such stark focus. #TogetherOnClimate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhvJKisXcAIGltr.jpg

Once again, thank you to @USRepKCastor for joining us today for an engaging conversation about combatting the #ClimateCrisis. #G7Parliament #TogetherOnClimate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ehu8dUcXgAEDz6w.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ehu8dUiXsAg2BSI.jpg
A critical message from Dr. Jane Goodall that we simply cannot afford to ignore. #G7Parliament #TogetherOnClimate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhunL_WWkAcAOUW.jpg
Thank you to Secretary @JohnKerry for joining us to share a special message with this year’s #G7Parliament meeting. #TogetherOnClimate https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1mrGmEnBAmzGy

Thank you to Secretary @ErnestMoniz and Dr. Jane Goodall (@JaneGoodallInst) for joining this year’s #G7Parliament meeting to discuss the urgent need for action to confront the climate crisis. #TogetherOnClimate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhuVtdoWkAEz4Sa.jpg

His Holiness the @DalaiLama’s voice is always a critical one in conversations of global justice. Take moment to watch his message to today’s #G7Parliament meeting. #TogetherOnClimate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhuQNYUWsAANdH5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1304791132677853188/vid/480x270/P3dGt7PpPZyAFcUl.mp4?tag=13

This is our charge: harnessing our collective resources, willpower and determination to advance a better, more just future for all members of our collective global family. #G7Parliament #TogetherOnClimate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhuIqrCXcAgKTem.jpg

As the COVID-19 pandemic continues to impact communities around the world, we have a responsibility to ensure our recovery from this crisis is sustainable and equitable. #G7Parliament #TogetherOnClimate https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1mrGmEnBAmzGy
It was a great privilege to welcome His Holiness the @DalaiLama to address the 2020 #G7Parliament meeting. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhuCYc7WkAENx1L.jpg

A smart, strategic approach to #COVID19 and the #ClimateCrisis provides the opportunity to get people back to work & school safely, and recover from today’s economic crisis while laying a foundation for a resilient, equitable economy that lifts all communities. #G7Parliament http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Eht-ZniXcAEDEoc.jpg

The climate crisis impacts every community — but it does not do so equally. Only by working together can we address the #ClimateCrisis with economic and environmental justice for all. #G7Parliament #TogetherOnClimate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Eht41R-XYAAb-jl.jpg

It is a pleasure to have @USRepKCastor join us today for a #G7Parliament conversation about advancing environmental, racial and economic justice worldwide. #TogetherOnClimate https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1mrGmEnBAmzGy

We can only solve the challenges facing our global community with a coordinated, international response. As Speaker of the House, it is my honor to host the 19th annual G7 Speakers’ Meeting. #G7Parliament #TogetherOnClimate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhthEVsXsAAuWnY.jpg

It is my privilege to host this year’s #G7Parliament meeting on behalf of the United States as my colleagues and I come together to discuss confronting #coronavirus, standing #TogetherOnClimate, and securing economic & environmental justice. https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1mrGmEnBAmzGy
Just 30 minutes left until we kick off the #G7Parliament meeting for 2020. Be sure to tune in at 7 am ET: https://www.facebook.com/NancyPelosi/live http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhtUPbuWsAI4uHB.png

The execution of wrestling champion #NavidAfkari for simply exercising his right to freedom of expression should remind the world that the clerical regime which governs #Iran is barbaric,cruel & evil. https://edition.cnn.com/2020/09/12/sport/iran-wrestler-navid-afkari-executed-intl/index.html
